extendedInfo.description: Bills Reminder helps you relax when it comes to the financial side of life by reminding you to pay your bills on time right on your mobile phone. If you've ever forgotten a bill or are just in need of a straightforward app to manage your money, Bills Reminder is the simple and secure solution that you're looking for. Bills Reminder is a trial version that allows you to use the app for 31 days before upgrading to the full version by purchasing a license key ($2.99) to unlock the app.Manage your moneyKeep up to date with your finances at a moment's notice by glancing at the brief summary displayed on the top of your screen. From there, you can see the amount of the bill, how many bills you have, and how many are overdue. The overdue bills are shown in red font with an accompanying bell icon to catch your attention. Depending on your setting, you will be alarmed by sound, vibration and light. In the notification area, on the top left of the screen, you receive notices to remind you of bills that are still awaiting payment.Financial flexibilityTake advantage of the flexibility that Bills Reminder offers by setting unique alarm styles for each bill. Each reminder can have its own due date, amount, billing cycle, notification time, and bill notes. You can also enable or disable each reminder as you wish so your bills never become a nuisance. Much more money management customization awaits you in the Options portion of this app.Classify your costsMake use of the simple menu to add or delete a reminder and always pay your bills on time. Sort your reminders by title, due date, or amount to prioritize your pending payments. Choose your currency and even customize the number and date format, how many alarms you want, and how often you want to be alerted. Setup email notification and ensure that you're reminded of your bill due date in multiple locations.

reviews.comment: NOT free - 30 day trial
reviews.author: Henry Rivard

reviews.title: Excellent App!
reviews.comment: This handy app does exactly what I need it for - remind me when bills are due and manage my bills coming due. If this is what you are looking for then I suggest you download this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Read update!
reviews.comment: Good app! Worth the price. Now I can use my google calendar just for my appointments.  Up date,  I bought it once,  I got a new phone,  put this on,  now wants me to pay again! Email to developer has so far not been answered.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not free... 30 days trial.
reviews.comment: Its ok... when bills are paid it wont allow u to enter note ie. Confirmation number.
reviews.author: tai huynh

reviews.title: Suggestions
reviews.comment: Good app but would be perfect if you had option to vary date & amount paid for each payment not just the overall expense entry.  Thanks :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Key??
reviews.comment: This app worked very well for me up until a month later when it wouldn\'t let me manage or add any reminders without purchasing a \"key\". Total b.s.

reviews.title: It works
reviews.comment: It\'s a lifesaver! I use it a lot...after the new update, it works perfect

reviews.title: Password option needed
reviews.comment: I would like a password option to ensure my data is safe. Also, I wish developer is upfront with the 30-day free trial. I only knew it was not free forever after installation.
